recipesJson.name: Darkside Of The Cookie
recipesJson.author: FlavorH0
recipesJson.description: Tailored for those with a major sweet tooth and willing to take a walk on the darkside. Caramel and butterscotch meld with the buttercream and torrone to form a warm gooey center. The joy provides a sweet sprinkled sugar coating similar to a funnel cake and combines with the cream base to replicate a fresh baked cookie.
